thread.section_title: Mosaic Weighted Blankets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mosaic Weighted Blankets | mosaicweightedblankets.com
thread.title: Leslie
thread.title_full: Mosaic Weighted Blankets reviewed by Leslie

author: Leslie
title: Leslie
text: My ADHD/Sensory issues son loves his weighted blanked. He says it feels like he is getting a hug all night long. He is now sleeping way better! I should have know this would work because as a baby, he LOVE being swaddled at night. I am thinking of trying it next time he sleeps over somewhere as I also have trouble sleeping.
